rows.label: qev085806_MSG0001
rows.name: What? Lao came back after we left?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0002
rows.name:
Classic timing, huh?
We told him all about how you saved the day.

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0003
rows.name: All he said was "be sure to thank 'em."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0004
rows.name: Then he wandered off again to who-knows-where.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0005
rows.name: Never a dull moment with that one...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0006
rows.name: That's how it should be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0007
rows.name: Better than the alternative, anyway...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0008
rows.name:
I hear you. I haven't forgotten how he was
when we first got here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0009
rows.name: What do you mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0010
rows.name: Lao's skills as a Pathfinder are pretty special.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0011
rows.name: They're going to help humanity carve out a life here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0012
rows.name:
But he didn't board the White Whale
because he thought he was useful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0013
rows.name:
He...he did it so he could get his wife
and daughter on the ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0014
rows.name: He thought his abilities would permit his family passage, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0015
rows.name: They didn't make it on board.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0016
rows.name: Right. The war hit right before he would've summoned them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0017
rows.name: Oh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0018
rows.name: Those were some dark days for him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0019
rows.name: Lao was empty. Like his soul was just...gone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0020
rows.name:
I don't know what he's been doing lately,
but whatever it is gives him purpose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0021
rows.name: It's good to see him living again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0022
rows.name: Not that it makes getting left behind any easier...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0023
rows.name: I've told you a hundred times already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0024
rows.name: If you had better skills, Lao wouldn't need to worry so much![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0025
rows.name: Y-yeah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0026
rows.name: You guys really do love him, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085806_MSG0027
rows.name:
But no one love their leader more than
Team Tatsu love Elma! No one![ST:wait ]
